name: Ape Intelligence
description:
This game was originally started as a submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 with the theme "Out of Control", but I didn't manage to finish it until now, four weeks later. Hope you'll enjoy it anyway.

–CONTROLS–

Arrow keys to move

Space to advance text

R to restart

Z to undo

+ / - to increase / decrease text size

[SPOILER]

Mouse to place and collect

1, 2, 3 to select item

Enter to confirm(test)

–CREDITS–

Idea, programming, art, music: DimusLv (me)

Sounds:

freesound.org (under the CC0 public domain licence)

Kenney Game Assets 1

me

If you find any bugs, glitches or weirdities, please comment.

Have a nice day! : )
